job.title: Software Engineer

job.description: Do you want to work for an Emmy Awardwinning company At Audible Magic we are building the most revolutionary media recognition technology and rights management solutions for the solutions for our customers solutions that meet the needs of the everchanging music and entertainment industry At Audible Magic we believe our customers are paramount and our reputation and integrity are the foundation of our businessltbrgtltbrgtWe are seeking a Software Engineer to join our team developing and supporting an existing Music Streaming Platform The successful candidate will join a
